An Ubucon is generally an informal, lightly structured gathering of Ubunteros.
There are also other meetings and UbuntuConferences, like the Ubuntu DeveloperSummit series and periodic IRC meetings.

See <nowiki>[[BuildingCommunity-RunningAnUbucon]]</nowiki> for planning ideas.

Here are web pages for some Ubucons:
